changeSet.author: Supriya
Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name in ("End of care/cured","DAMA","Defaulter","Death","Transfer","Rejected") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Burn-outcome') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from program where name='Burn';

changeSet.author: Supriya
Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from program_workflow_state where concept_id in (select concept_id from concept_name where name in ('Identification','Ambulatory care','Surgical care','Post operative ambulatory care','External care','Long term follow-up care') and program_workflow_id = (select program_workflow_id from program_workflow pw join concept_name cn on pw.concept_id = cn.concept_id where pw.concept_id = (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'Burn-workflow' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' ) and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED') and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED');
